net.jodah.failsafe

Class ExecutionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jodah.failsafe.ExecutionContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractExecution

    public class ExecutionContext
extends Object
    Contextual execution information.
